text: To the families & loved ones of the deceased, #AfricaWeather sends its deepest condolences. Speedy recovery to the injured. #BridgeCollapse
Presidency: President Jacob Zuma has extended condolences to the families of those who lost their lives in the #BridgeCollapse
Thank u to City of Joburg for such a quick response to yesterday's tragedy. Big Ups to Mayor Parks Tau! #BridgeCollapse
Preach RT @ali_naka Unfortunately these Construction Cartels are protected by some among us who traded conscience 4 profit. #BridgeCollapse
